description:
The-top-of-the-line Mohu Leaf UltimateTM delivers the most popular shows and more on network television for FREE in full 1080 HD. These stations include Fox, PBS, ABC, CBS and NBC, with each network having its own digital sub-channels for maximum content. The Leaf Ultimate is the most powerful Leaf to date, replacing the award-winning Leaf Plus and providing the most sophisticated amplification Mohu offers.

With the Mohu Leaf Ultimate, you no longer have to pay high monthly cable or satellite bills to enjoy your favorite shows. The Leaf Ultimate can pull in all of your local news, weather, sitcoms, kids and sports programming with NO monthly contract or bills.
title: Mohu Leaf 50 Indoor HDTV Antenna (formerly Leaf Ultimate) - Manufacturer Refurbished
